idea-plugin.name: Battery Status
idea-plugin.description:
Display battery status in the Status Bar (updated every 20 seconds, configurable in File > Settings... > Tools > Battery Status).
Useful if you run IDE in full screen.

Requirements:
  • Windows: plugin should work as it.
  • Linux: you must be able to invoke acpi -b. Be sure ACPI is installed: on Debian or Ubuntu, type sudo apt install acpi.
  • MacOS: plugin should work as it. You must be able to invoke pmset -g batt.
Plugin is currently tested on Windows 10 and Ubuntu 18.04 LTS with both JBR (JetBrains JRE) 8 and 11, on IntelliJ 2017.3 and better.
MacOS: help wanted!
